subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon defeated Roger Federer, 4-6, 6-4, 6-3, on Monday at the Masters Cup in Shanghai in Federer’s first match since a sore back forced him out of his previous tournament. The ninth-ranked Simon was added to the field when No. 1 Rafael Nadal withdrew with knee tendinitis.
